description: Detects when a file with a suspicious extension is created in the startup folder
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
false_positives: Rare legitimate usage of some of the extensions mentioned in the rule
name: Suspicious Startup Folder Persistence
query: (file.path.text:*\\Windows\\Start\ Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\* AND file.path.text:(*.vbs OR *.vbe OR *.bat OR *.ps1 OR *.hta OR *.dll OR *.jar OR *.msi OR *.scr OR *.cmd))
